SEARCH
Package cookbook.controller

Class IngredientDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
cookbook.controller.BaseDaoImpl
cookbook.controller.IngredientDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IngredientDao
public class IngredientDaoImpl extends BaseDaoImpl implements IngredientDao
IngredientDaoImpl is a concrete implementation of the IngredientDao interface. It provides methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting ingredients, as well as managing units in the cookbook application.

  • Constructor Summary

      Parameters:
      production - if true, connects to the production database; if false, connects to the test database.
